lead_paragraph: Shares of Harley-Davidson dropped 10 percent after a disappointing quarterly report, while DuPont lowered its forecast for the year.

headline.print_headline: Disappointment in Earnings and Oil Prices
headline.main: Disappointment on Earnings and Oil Prices Weigh on Market

snippet: Shares of Harley-Davidson dropped 10 percent after a disappointing quarterly report, while DuPont lowered its forecast for the year.
abstract: Stocks end mostly lower as investors respond to tepid corporate results and decline in price of crude oil.
